mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edu_papermulti (id, paperId, torfId, createTime, updateTime, reserv1, reserv2) VALUES (#{id}, #{paperId}, #{torfId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{reserve1}, #{reserve2})
mapper.update: UPDATE updateChapter SET paperId=#{paperId}, torfId=#{torfId}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{createTime}, reverse1=#{reverse1}, reverse2=#{reverse2} where id=#{id}
